subject: Alec's Alpha Unit (was Re: The Intelligence Project Description...)
author: Guy
full_text:
Dave - 

I sent along your EVP clip to Alec and here's his response:

"Guy,
far out man!
 
Had a listen to it in this noisy (Spanish) i/net cafe - even then - 
it shows through even on a one-play - I even think I recognise the 
voice - its a bit like mine, someone from my area.
 
This is absolutely mind-destroying!  Have you told XXX?
 
To establish the provenance of this can we establish for the record, 
the person who did the experiment, what method and equipment he/she 
used, time, date and location.
 
I am a state of shock.....
 
Lemme outa here!!!
 
Alec"

I get the strong feeling he was pleased...:)

Anyhow - could you either post the answers to his questions at the 
end or send them to me in e-mail?

Thanks.

Guy Jackson

E-mail: yzzzguy @ yahoo.com



--- In EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com, " RetroCom" <vfp19968@...> wrote:
>
> Guy,
>  If you have contact with Alec you may wish to forward the 
attached capture I got yesterday. The first part of the message was 
a salutation from Canada. I clipped that part off and here is the 
main message.
> 
> "Alpha may be best system" 
> 
> Thanks,
> Dave
> --- yzzzguy@... wrote:
<rest snipped>
